title: Datta Vihara Shrine / Karan Darda Architects
description: The relocation of the existing shrine due to a new residential project presented an opportunity to design a space that seamlessly integrates tradition with contemporary needs. The given 400 sqft site was envisioned not merely as a shrine to Lord Datta, a local deity, but as a vibrant community space, fostering connection and togetherness.
author: Miwa Negoro

title: Pavilhão Varanda House / ARQBR Arquitetura e Urbanismo
description: Located in the South Individual Housing Sector in Brasília, this small building was designed as a leisure pavilion attached to an existing house. The residents’ goal was to create a space for family recreation while also accommodating a larger number of guests.
